results.title: Simvastatin inhibits inflammation in ischemia-reperfusion injury.
results.text_hl: Compared to the sham group and I/R plus PBS group, the I/R plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group had attenuated @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Dental_Leakage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003763 @@@vascular leakage@@@, and @DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@muscular damage@@@ (P<0.05).

citations.NLM: Zhao Y, Feng Q, Huang Z, Li W, Chen B, Jiang L, Wu B, Ding W, Xu G, Pan H, Wei W, Luo W, Luo Q. Simvastatin inhibits inflammation in ischemia-reperfusion injury. Inflammation. 2014 Oct;37(5):1865-75. PMID: 24912811
